sourcesContent:
import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; export default function ProfileSettingsPage() { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [user, setUser] = useState({ fullName: "", contactEmail: "", phone: "", language: "English", notifications: true, }); useEffect(() => { async function fetchUserProfile() { try { const res = await axios.get("/api/user/profile"); const data = res.data; setUser({ fullName: data.fullName || "", contactEmail: data.email || "", phone: data.phone || "", language: data.language || "English", notifications: data.notifications ?? true, }); } catch (err) { console.error("Failed to fetch user profile:", err); // Optionally show an error message here } finally { setLoading(false); } } fetchUserProfile(); }, []); if (loading) { return (
Loading profile...
); } return (

setUser({ ...user, phone: e.target.value })} className="w-full bg-gray-800 p-3 rounded" />
setUser({ ...user, notifications: e.target.checked })} />
); }
